active_skill.name: Boring Burst
active_skill.description:
Enters the driving state and charges enemies, launching a drilling attack upon hit and dealing Physical DMG.

DMG Multiplier:
864%/921%/979%/1036%/1094%
Daze Multiplier: 
316%/337%/358%/379%/400%

Cooldown 18s

additional_ability.name: Drill Team Mobilization
additional_ability.description: When there are 2 or more Belobog Heavy Industries characters in your squad: Bangboo Chain Attack DMG increases by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. If the target is Burning or Shocked, this buff increases by an additional 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%.

chain_attack.name: Demolition Drill
chain_attack.description:
Enters the driving state and charges enemies, launching a multi-hit drilling attack upon hit and dealing massive Physical DMG.

DMG Multiplier:
997%/1064%/1130%/1197%/1263%

Daze Multiplier: 
142%/152%/161%/171%/180%
